1370: Menaures was born in Op 't Speuy in 1370.
1377: Lost mother at the age of 7.
Thomas took care of Menaures since Menaures was 8.
1380: Lost father at the age of 10.
Left Op 't Speuy.A.3 for lack of a breadwinner.
Went to live in the orphanage at age 11.
1383: Lost sibling Pauels in 1383 when Pauels was 11.
1387: Menaures moved to Walker straet.A.4 in 1387.
Left orphanage at the age of 18.
1388: Got married to Folqui at age 19 in 1388.
Had Folqui move in at Walker straet.A.4 after marriage.
1389: Had a daughter with Folqui, Geile, at age 19.
1391: Lost his wife Folqui while she was giving birth to Heylewigis in 1391.
Lost sibling Hadewigis in 1391 when Hadewigis was 15.
1392: Got married a second time to Alretieren at age 23 in 1392.
Had Alretieren move in at Walker straet.A.4 after marriage.
1398: Got married a third time to Emgelberna at age 29 in 1398.
Had Emgelberna move in at Walker straet.A.4 after marriage.
1399: Had a son with Emgelberna, Rolekine, at age 29.
Lost daughter Heylewigis when Heylewigis was 9 years old.
